TEXT.TITLE: LOCKHEED <LK> GETS 165.7 MLN DLRS IN CONTRACTS
TEXT.BODY: Lockheed Corp has been awarded 165.7 mln dlrs in military contracts, including a 102.4 mln dlr contract for eight C-130 aircraft for the Air Force Reserve, the Air Force said. reuter
